#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,a,b,i,j;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
                   cin >> a >> b >> i >> j;
                   
                   if(((a%i==0 && b%j == 0) && (a>=i && b>=j)) || ((a%j ==0 && b%i==0)&& (a>=j && b>=i)))
                      cout << "yes" << endl;
                   else
                      cout << "no" << endl;  
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;
}
